discovery.name: http-title
discovery.description: Fetches page titles from HTTP services.
discovery.example:
80/tcp open  http
| http-title: Example Domain
|_Requested resource was /

discovery.name: http-enum
discovery.example:
80/tcp open  http
| http-enum:
|   /admin/: Potential admin interface
|_  /images/: Potentially interesting directory w/ listing

discovery.name: dns-brute
discovery.description: Performs DNS subdomain brute force enumeration.
discovery.example:
Host scripts results:
| dns-brute:
|   mail.example.com - 192.0.2.10
|   dev.example.com - 192.0.2.20
|_  shop.example.com - 192.0.2.30

discovery.name: smb-os-discovery
discovery.description: Discovers remote OS information via SMB banner data.
discovery.example:
445/tcp open  microsoft-ds
| smb-os-discovery:
|   OS: Windows 10 Pro 19041
|   Computer name: HOST
|_  Workgroup: WORKGROUP

vuln.name: smb-vuln-ms17-010
vuln.example:
445/tcp open  microsoft-ds
| smb-vuln-ms17-010: VULNERABLE
|   MS17-010: Microsoft SMBv1 Multiple Vulnerabilities
|_  State: VULNERABLE

vuln.name: http-vuln-cve2009-3960
vuln.description: Checks for directory traversal vulnerability in HTTP servers.
vuln.example:
80/tcp open  http
| http-vuln-cve2009-3960:
|   VULNERABLE: Directory traversal
|_  State: VULNERABLE

safe.name: ftp-anon
safe.example:
21/tcp open  ftp
| ftp-anon: Anonymous FTP login allowed (FTP code 230)
|_-rw-r--r--   1 ftp      ftp        0 Jan 01 00:00 readme.txt

safe.name: ssl-cert
safe.example:
443/tcp open  https
| ssl-cert: Subject: commonName=example.com
| Not valid before: 2020-06-01T00:00:00
|_Not valid after: 2022-06-01T12:00:00
